extendedInfo.description: Worldâs largest edition of Dhammapada, this is illustrated with 423 especially commissioned works of art. The book represents the quintessence of Buddhism, embodied in 423 stanzas that represent the words of the Buddha. The wisdom implicit in these sacred verses is timeless and is universally applicable. This encompasses both spiritual and worldly situations. The book classified into 23 chapters is arranged to give the reader the original Pali in Roman characters and the translation of each stanza at two levels. The prose order of each stanza is provided, with the meaning of each word explained. The story, out of which the verses emerged, is also provided. A comprehensive commentary facilitates the understanding of the work in depth. The book comes in an attractive slip-case, with an illustration depicting one of the most serene images of the Buddha adorning the cover.Number of pages in the original book: 1200   (Hardcover - A4 size)Dhammapada Android app features the same illustrations and stances of the original book and more, please refer to below feature list for more details* Ability to read the book offline (No internet connectivity required)* Ability to view and download original illustrations onto your SD card / phone for FREE* Can set illustrations as your wallpaper* Listen to stances in Pali language with audio English translation* Interchangeable night and day modes for comfortable reading* Supports landscape and portrait modes* Save bookmarks with your own remark to remember the place you stopped reading* Easy to use user interface* Ability to donate via the app If you have any queries or questions, please write to us at dhammapada.app@e3xglobal.comMay this be a gift to all the Buddhists and others who likes to read in the world!PS: Please leave a comment if you like the app and donate if you really love it so that we can continue our service to digitize more books onto the Android platform.

reviews.title: Concise introduction
reviews.comment: Great app with verse, short explanation and commentary. Good index, wish it had a favorite button to quick reference the verses I like most. Otherwise great!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Life changing
reviews.comment: Began my spiritual journey here, and have since learned a great deal not only about myself, but the world as a whole.  Must read for sure.
reviews.author: Caleb Megie

reviews.title: Wow! It \'s exellent  i like dis app...!!
reviews.comment: I really honour whoever  made dis app. I dont knw how to pay thanx to da  Composer of this apps.......hats off to u##!
reviews.author: tenzin londen

reviews.title: Densum
reviews.comment: Good book. Lots of knowledge. I\'ve always wonder how Buddhist can justify charging people to spread the Dharma when they are supposed to give it freely. This book includes the spirit of Buddhism as well as its knowledge.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best App
reviews.comment: Very nicely written dhamapada verses, complete with background stories and explanation of each word.
reviews.author: Milind Lokde

reviews.title: Too good...
reviews.comment: Thanks bhante...its our priviledge n honour to get to know about Thagat Lord Bhuddha n his teachings. NAMO BUDDHAYA.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dhammapada, complete!
reviews.comment: Take it from me. This App is FREE AND SO INFORMATIVE. Learn, know, teach? This is it, the real Dhammapada.
reviews.author: Law Ba

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Thank you venerable bhante! Sadhu sadhu sadhu!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Book
reviews.comment: Amazing. The stories are explained very well and the verses are translated word by word from Pali. Wonderful job. I myself is an android developer and so let me know if you need any help in creating more apps like this.
reviews.author: Pal Subbiah

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Truly peaceful words from a wise man.
reviews.author: Daniel Weinzierl

reviews.title: Informative
reviews.comment: Very interesting for a complete amateur at this like me.

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is by far the best Dhammapada app. It has pictures, stories, the text, translation of the text and commentary. It\'s awesome!

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: I\'m a non Buddhist, and this app is really great for people like us to understand Buddhism properly. Superb.

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Could be smoother in bookmarking and last page read

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: I just started reading this app lastnight and read until my eyes had fallen heavy.  Since I bought my cell months ago, I\'ve been searching for the best buddhist app and I finally found it here.  Thank you so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: First of all, \'Vandami bhante\' Thank u for this app, There are many buddhists but they don\'t know our dhamma, so this is very great app for them like my friends.  So thanks again. There is just one request bhante, please make an app tripitaka in english. Thanks bhante.
reviews.author: Saurabh Ingole
